evidence.claim: CareWorks Health Services utilizes FHIR and HL7 standards for healthcare data exchange.
The company supports HIPAA compliance in their services, ensuring data protection.
CareWorks implements EDI protocols for efficient healthcare transaction processing.
Integration with major EHR systems is facilitated through their APIs.
They use cloud platforms to support scalability and data management.

icp.icp_reason: No evidence of using or needing X12 transactions was found.
